patterns: What kind of chatbot are you?
What can you help me with?
What can you assist me with?
What kind of AI are you?
What can you do for me?
responses: I'm a simple chatbot created to demonstrate NLP basics.
I'm a Python chatbot that uses NLTK for natural language processing.
I'm here to help you understand how chatbots work!
I'm a conversational AI designed to help with general questions and provide information.
I can assist with simple conversations and provide information based on my training.
I was created to assist users with basic queries and engage in conversation.
I'm an AI built to answer questions and provide helpful responses.

responses: I can chat with you about simple topics. Try asking me who I am or just say hello!
I'm here to have a conversation. Try greeting me or asking what I can do.
I can help with general questions and conversations. What would you like to know?
I'm here to assist you! What can I help you with?
I'm ready to help! What would you like to know?
Just let me know what you need, and I'll do my best to assist!

I don't have weather information, but you can check your local weather service for updates.

responses: I don't have access to real-time information, but you can check your device's clock for the current time.
I can't provide the current time, but you can easily find it on your device.
I don't have access to the current time, but you can check your system clock.
I don't have time information, but you can check your device's time settings.

patterns: I want to hear a joke
Can you tell me a joke?
I want to hear a good joke
What's a funny thing to say?
Can you tell a funny one?
I want to hear a pun
Can you tell me something hilarious?
Can you share a good laugh?
Can you throw in a joke?
responses: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Why don't some couples go to the gym? Because some relationships don't work out!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
Why did the math book look so sad? Because it had too many problems!
Why don't parallel lines ever get into arguments? Because they have the same slope!
Why did the chicken join a band? Because it had the drumsticks!
Why can't basketball players go on vacation? Because they would get called for traveling!

I'm here to assist you! Please try asking your question in a different way.
I'm not sure I understand. Could you please explain more clearly?
I'm here to help! Could you please rephrase your question?
Let's try that again—can you clarify what you mean?

patterns: Tell me something I don't know
responses: Did you know that octopuses have three hearts and can change color to blend into their surroundings?
A fun fact: The smell of rain is caused by a bacteria called actinomycetes, which produces a scent when wet.
Here's one: The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes!
Interesting fact: Honey never spoils because of its natural preservatives like low water content and high acidity.
Did you know that the human body contains about 0.2 milligrams of gold, most of it in the blood?

responses: A good resume includes clear sections like contact info, summary, skills, experience, and education. Tailor it to the job and use action verbs.
For resume tips, keep it concise, highlight achievements, and use a clean format. Check online templates for inspiration.
I can't review resumes, but focus on quantifying achievements and matching skills to job descriptions.
To improve your resume, use keywords from job postings and ensure it's easy to read with bullet points.
I can provide basic explanations of tech concepts. For example, Python is a versatile programming language used for web development, data science, and more.
